attributes.description: This is where the recycled paper is sent so it can be reused into new paper to be able to be used by consumers.
attributes.title: Virgina

attributes.description: The Mead company sends out their items all over the world. Including to Wal-Mart. This would be the last stop for when we would get our paper.
attributes.title: Indiana

attributes.description: Here is where they have the paper mills. It is where they make paper for the Mead brand that is also covered by ACCO. This is where the Meadwestvaco copanay is located. They do packaging here and send items all over the world.
attributes.title: Virginia

attributes.description: At this place they have managed timberlands. Here they raise trees to use just to make paper. Meads owns over 3 millian forest lands located here.
attributes.title: West Virginia

attributes.description: This is where the MeadWestvaco company is located. Here is where they have a paper mill and make the paper for the Mead brand.
attributes.title: West Virginia to Virginia
